body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Joshua Diaz and I'm from CleanStay Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison. Can you please provide me with your room number and the date of your check-in for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number is two three four five and I checked in on the sixth of October.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Madison. Could you also share your contact number so we can follow up with you regarding the issue you're facing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five zero one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you, Madison. We'll look into the bad smell concern you've reported. I appreciate your patience while we address it.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Okay, thank you. I was feeling confused, but I'm glad it's being looked into.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Madison. We strive to ensure a comfortable stay for all our guests. We'll be in touch with updates soon. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help. Have a good day too, bye!
